bow: well it happened my son fell off our bed he was in the middle with pillows around him but he surprised me and scooted feet first off it was like slow motion was about 10 feet away making his bottle and could not get to him the terror in his eyes made me feel like the biggest failure in the world picked him up tried not to make huge deal about it so he would calm down faster and gave him kisses and looked him over he was over it in 30 seconds and was signing for his bottle and giggling at himself in the mirror still feel an idiot and will not be leaving him on the bed again will say was very happy when it was my fiance not me who was watching our son when that first happened lol my husband is mad but trying not to show it much do beat yourself up to much most people wo admit it but it really happens to just about everyone my son fell off his changing table when he was about months and he bounced off my bed when he was year and half he almost now and he perfectly healthy and intelligent kids get hurt it part of life unless you re hurting him or deliberately leaving him in seriously dangerous places you re doing fine happens truth you ca beat yourself up too much my husband and both watched as our two year old fell head first off the bottom step as we were discussing who forgot to put the gate up ohhhh the irony she moved in slow motion and there was that awful pause before the wails and tears she was fine even hit her head on wood floor and she was absolutely fine much to my surprise kept checking on her all night trying to see if she had concussion next day she did even have bruise kids are resilient now have pillows on the floor when my month old is on the couch that sinking guilt is the worst feeling in the world our daughter fell off her change table just before her first birthday and the day before she started daycare she sobbed and sobbed and her nose bled my husband had to take care of her because was beside myself about it and my crying was making her crying worse she went to her first day of daycare with black eye that spanned wide spectrum of colours we got lot of dirty looks until it went away yeah held it in so would make it worse thank god had his bottle already ready think that helped it was the trickle of blood from her nose that did me in was keeping it together until that happened nothing to be mad about it happens to the best of us was mad at my fiance it was honest accident lol he ll be over it soon it happens my son rolled over for the first time when was unprepared and fell off the couch it was the middle of the night had nursed him and he was wiiiiide awake so put him on pillow on the couch beside me while surfed the internet he rolled right off the couch and bumped his little head on the table before he fell on the floor worst mom ever he was fine though not bruise or scrape still feel bit bad about it and he nine years old now lol you are alone do beat yourself up most kids fall off of things even when they re babies he okay you did your best to keep him safe you re not failure bad moms do bother to put the baby in the middle of the bead surrounded by pillows so he wo fall you did because you love him and you re good mom aww man yeah would have cried if he bleed the thump was the worst noise ever both of my boys fell off beds at some point not that we we re being careless but one day they ca scoot then the next they can agree with the do beat yourself up it happens and sadly things like this are gon na happen kids get hurt they learn we learn and life goes on you are failure failure would show this kind of concern all moms make mistakes yeah after my husband got over the knee jerk reaction to be mad he said the same thing know how hard it is to let go of mommy guilt so ll just commiserate bit my daughter fell off the couch at months by straightening her body out and slipping under my arm fleece pj leather couch slippery jesus some mothers are so ridiculously hard on themselves is he hurt no then relax and be more careful in the future honestly ca understand why someone would be upset enough about this kind of thing to post about it on reddit your kid is fabergé egg do feel too bad my daughter somehow managed to fall off the far side of the couch before she could roll over in the floor never did figure that out did the same thing to my mom when was tiny she put me on the bed turned to get me an outfit turned back and there was going off the other side of the bed she had never seen me roll before either it happens to just about everybody yes you will feel like an idiot but take solace in the idea that you are the only one who has felt that way and there will be plenty more who follow you it happened to us when my daughter was around months she sat up and sorta crawled over me after nursing and flipped off the bed it was awful my husband bolted out of the shower and jumped out of bed cried and nursed her it would was worse than when she was in the nicu as newborn it happens it terrifying everyone is ok inch hugs do your panties hurt up there yeah he just missed the pillow he kicked off before he fell thanks keep trying to remember that do be yep it looks like that fits just once my baby has fallen off the bed or times now most of them off of an air mattress on the floor so it was so bad but these things happen she over it really quick she concerned about little scar on his perfect face the ladies think scars are hot so hear am not negligent mother and my daughter has fallen off the bed three times she 16 months old now but the first yep mine did that too just the shock of finding out what rough means think how on earth could you know that someone needs to get off their high horse upvote for gremlins my daughter rolled of my best friends parents bed when she was about six or seven months my best friend grandmother had died and was practically part of the family so spent week at their house with my daughter single mom helping them prepare the wake and funeral and just generally being there for the family the morning of the funeral rolls around and there are 15+ people in their house all trying to get ready at the same time her parents offer me their shower while they are getting ready in their room with few other people popping in and out to play with the baby and get ready themselves nora my daughter is laying in the middle of the bed and starts scooching towards the edge no one has noticed yet she starts getting closer to the edge of the bed still no one has noticed she gets to the edge my best friends mom turns around just in time to see her fall headfirst onto the hardwood chaos ensued was not part of it because wa still showering get out everyone is acting normal and getting dressed in different bedroom all of sudden someone calls me into the other bedroom do panic why am not panicking what happened whats wrong spoiler starting to panic well nora fell off our bed is she bleeding is she hurt do we need to call an ambulance no no she fine not even crying anymore just little tumble just did want you to worry everyone knows now that if they do want me to panic the words do panic should not come
